data.title: Because Candy! (Quality Candy)
data.text:
What a great store. Lots of old timey and hard to find candies. Great seasonal offerings too. Whether you're looking for a really special box of chocolate to gift or wanting to take a sugary trip back in time or just want some quality candy, this is a great place.

Have met the owner once or twice, he's very passionate about this business.

data.title: Great handmade candies
data.text: This place is very close to my work, and I have been there to purchase gifts for occasions such as birthdays, Easter and Valentine's Day.  This is a nice place if you want to get a gift that is impressive, as it is clearly handcrafted.  It's also pricey because of that.  The major sellers are the different flavored candy covered nuts and individual candies that come in bags or jars.  They do carry other items that are not made by Andy's, like the old-fashioned candy sticks and other novelty items.  All are great quality.  The store is not a huge one so there isn't a ton of inventory but that's also nice.  I would recommend that you stop by here to visit and check it out.

data.title: Best candy store ever
data.text: An amazing variety of candy from all over the world. This is a great place to buy gifts. I buy my kids their Easter candy here every year. I'm in there all the time buying sweets for my co-workers.

data.title: A candy store for everyone
data.text: I love coming here when looking for something different or higher end (e.g., good dark chocolate).  All kinds of different candies here, some imported and some locally made, all good quality.  Good place to go when looking for a gift for someone too.  Sometimes I pop in here for a little thank you gift for a friend or for a co-worker etc.  Staff are super nice and informative too.

data.title: Great variety, nice clean place with lots of options, inlcuding savory!
data.text: This place has a good downtown location, lots of choices, including cold treats and popsicles.  I had a mango sticky rice  popsicles, pricey but good! There were awesome samples to shake out of clear jars, and we bought some double bacon white chocolate pretzel thingies, they were a hit, sure didn't last long, I wish I had bought more!

data.title: Sacramento's Sweetest!!
data.text: Stop in you won't be sorry. Everything was over the top fresh and light!!! Words can't describe the quality of the candy in the store and employees were second to none!!! Buy one of everything!!!

data.title: My grandkids and I love this place!
data.text: Not sure how long they've been open but they are a definite go to for holiday gifts and just for a late day treat.  The Easter candies we found for the grandchildren were the best we've ever seen...and tasty too!  Highly recommended!

data.title: The candy store of your childhood
data.text: Many delicious hard to find older candies. They also have a nice selection of locally produced candy (and gelato push pops).

data.title: The best old and new!
data.text: This is a fantastic place where you can find some of your old favorites and very tasty new treats from local spots.  I would recommend this for kids of all ages.

data.title: It will cost you a fortune, but worth it!
data.text: The site of the varity and assortment of memeroable old time brands is mesmorizing.  You pay the pound so you don't realize how much your basket weighs. But you just can't wait to check out to taste the candy you loved as a kid.

data.title: Sweet tooth Heaven
data.text: Simply the best!  The staff is kind and knowledgeable and they are very willing to accommodate you.  I wanted to mail some fine chocolate to the east coast and they went above and beyond to not only deliver the chocolate, but they even recommeded some great candy as well.

data.title: Great Candy shop - special candies for all occasions
data.text: I go to Andy's for very special candies - this is not your See's Candy shop.  It has an excellent variety of very unique chocolates and other candies

data.title: Old favorites and new treats!
data.text: If you want to find a candy you have not seen in years or a unique chocolate that goes perfect with wine this is a great spot to check out!

data.title: One of a kind candy shop
data.text: Very good chocolates, flavors that you normally cannot find elsewhere. Nice place to visit near the Capitol museum and tours.

data.title: Delicioso
data.text: Fue nuestra 3era parada en un Tour de Comida y nos encanto, el dueño muy amable, los dulces y chocolates deliciosos. Si buscas un regalo dulce o algo para dar en fiestas aquí puedes encontrar una buena opción.
